fixedOption.explain:
Changes Soaring Blades - Draw to a max 3 charge skill.
- Soring Sword count +3
- Charged once per Advanced skill attack (Soaring Blades - Draw excluded)
- Can't be auto-charged.

Soaring Blades - Draw and Advanced skills (except Awakening) can be canceled into each other during post-casting delay.

Overall Damage +2%
Fire Damage +20

[Fire Force]
Attacks deliver Fire attacks, depending on your Fire Damage. (Cooldown: 1.5 sec.)

- 150 to below 250: Infernal Road
- 250 or more: Meteor

- Meteor Burns enemies for 15 sec. (Cooldown: 10 sec.)
